Detailed Description

This module contains classes that handle vectors, quaternions, portals, bounding boxes, lines, planes, among others.

Default constructor for Angle.

float DEG_TO_RAD ( float  angle  )  [inline]

This function converts an angle in degrees to an angle in radians.

Parameters:
angle The angle in degrees that is to be converted.
Returns:
The angle in radians.

template<class Functor, class X_TYPE>
void integrate ( const Functor &  F,
X_TYPE &  x,
float  h 
) [inline]

This function integrates the input Functor for one step of size h for the given initial value x.

It does this numerically using Runge-Kutta (Order Four).

X_TYPE must support : 

    float * X_TYPE
    X_TYPE + X_TYPE
    += X_TYPE

template<class TYPE>
ApproachFunctor<TYPE> makeApproach ( const TYPE &  desiredValue,
float  approachRate = 1.f 
) [inline]

This function is a helper so that you do not have to specify the type of the desiredValue.

float RAD_TO_DEG ( float  angle  )  [inline]

This function converts an angle in radians to an angle in degrees.

Parameters:
angle The angle in radians that is to be converted.
Returns:
The angle in degrees.

void Quaternion::slerp ( const Quaternion &  qStart,
const Quaternion &  qEnd,
float  t 
) [inherited]

This method slerps from qStart when t = 0 to qEnd when t = 1.

It is safe for the result quaternion (i.e. 'this') to be one of the parameters.

Parameters:
qStart The quaternion to start from.
qEnd The quaternion to end at from.
t A value in the range [0, 1] that indicates the fraction to slerp between to to input quaternions.
